##: The reason for this not being portable is because the installer cannot be extracted properly.
description: An easy and customizable tool for exploring, and analyzing Windows event logs.
pre_install: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }
pre_uninstall: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }

script: # Using a custom script to get the date for when it was last modified, due to the
# version provided in the website (eg. '1.6') being unreliable for future updates.
